title: Make the app background more colorful

requirements.text: Update the global page background styling to be more colorful by replacing the current subtle background gradient (used on the main app container and loading screen) with a richer multi-stop gradient that incorporates existing theme colors (e.g., primary/secondary/accent) while maintaining readable contrast for all foreground text in both light and dark modes.

quotes: Just make the background color more colorful

acceptanceCriteria: On both the loading screen and the main app shell, the background appears noticeably more colorful than the current gradient.
Text and UI elements remain clearly legible (no low-contrast sections) in both light mode (:root) and dark mode (.dark).
The change is implemented without editing any files listed under frontend immutablePaths.

constraints: Frontend immutablePaths must not be edited (frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui).
Backend must remain single-actor; no backend changes are required for this request.
nonGoals: Adding new features unrelated to background styling (e.g., gameplay changes, wallet logic changes).
Introducing third-party theming libraries or changing the authentication flow.
